Staff are working remotely, and will respond to email.  Please send any questions to your advisor or to hcollege@uic.edu.   COVID-19 Updates and Resources          Resources  There are a number of resources to help students achieve their goals and make their college experience a success. From tutoring to scholarships, the Honors College offers a few unique resources available to students. You can visit the UIC Campus Resources website for information about the various offices, departments, and services offered across campus. This includes, but is not limited to, technological, health and wellness, academic, community building and student support, career services, and safety resources.      UIC senior    “Great tutor – I understand a lot better”    UIC Senior student        .   The above quote is from a UIC senior student after an hour-long session. Most students who attend tutoring strongly agree that the sessions are productive and beneficial, and that the tutors are engaged and demonstrate interest in the personal and academic development of the students seeking assistance.
